description: "Mankind's most amazing archaeological discovery of the 20th century "- Sanxingdui Site, Sanxingdui culture is a splendid ancient civilization with bronzes, cities, written symbols and large ceremonial buildings. In October 1997, Sanxingdui Museum was completed and opened, which will re-display the ancient Shu civilization that has disappeared.Three star heap miracle, sleep for thousands of years, wake up to the world.
name: Sanxingdui Poker
